headline: BJ’s, Kroger and 8 Other Stocks to Benefit From Retail’s Slump
summary: Retail stocks are on sale, offering a potential opportunity for bargain hunters.  For the past year, retail stocks have been decidedly out of fashion.  Blame a sluggish job market and worries over President Donald Trump’s tariff wars.

raw.headline: BJ’s, Kroger and 8 Other Stocks to Benefit From Retail’s Slump

headline: Will Kroger (KR) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?
summary: Kroger (KR) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

raw.headline: Will Kroger (KR) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?
raw.summary: Kroger (KR) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

headline: Kroger doubles down on large-format stores as it chases growth
summary: The grocer plans to open numerous locations under its Marketplace banner in Indiana, Texas and West Virginia over the next two years.

raw.headline: Kroger doubles down on large-format stores as it chases growth
raw.summary: The grocer plans to open numerous locations under its Marketplace banner in Indiana, Texas and West Virginia over the next two years.

headline: 3 Consumer Stocks That Concern Us
summary: Retailers are overhauling their operations as technology redefines the shopping experience. Digitization has been one of the keys to staying competitive against e-commerce rivals, a move that has enabled the industry to grow same-store sales. Consequently, retail stocks have climbed 10.1% over the past six months, nearly mirroring the S&P 500.
